name: AIR LINK INTERNATIONAL AVIATION COLLEGE
about: Air Link International Aviation College (ALIAC) is a private institution specializing in aviation education, located in Pasay, Metro Manila, Philippines. Founded in 1982 by Captain Geronimo Amurao, it has evolved from a small flying school into a renowned college. ALIAC offers various programs, including Bachelor of Science in Aviation, Aerospace Engineering, and Aircraft Maintenance Technology, all accredited by the Commission on Higher Education (CHED) and the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP). The college provides hands-on training with 28 aircraft and state-of-the-art facilities, ensuring comprehensive practical education. With a strong emphasis on academic excellence, safety, and technological advancement, ALIAC prepares students for lucrative careers in the aviation industry.
